mapper.select: select code,category, name, owner, business_number, contact,address from tbl_company
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_company (code, name, domestic_foreign, deal_type, owner, contact, address, currency, invoice_issue, account, company_size, business_number, taxcode, category, start_date, end_date, sales) values
(COMPANY_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{domestic_foreign}, #{deal_type}, #{owner}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{currency}, #{invoice_issue}, #{account}, #{company_size}, #{business_number}, #{taxcode}, #{category}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{sales} )
